summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, notifying them that a CD with replacement discovery files has been sent via FedEx overnight delivery to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). The email includes an attached password letter for the CD.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the recipient of a CD containing replacement discovery files sent to her at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is informing a recipient that a CD has been sent to Ghislaine Maxwell at MDC via FedEx overnight delivery.

connections.description: The prosecutor is corresponding about sending discovery materials to the defendant, Ghislaine Maxwell, who is in custody.

events.title: Discovery CD Sent to Maxwell
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's office sends a CD with replacement discovery files via FedEx overnight delivery to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center.

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: On October 29, 2020, the U.S. Attorney's office sent a CD with replacement discovery files to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center.
The delivery was made via FedEx overnight service, indicating urgency or importance of the materials.
A password letter was attached to the email, suggesting the CD contents were encrypted or protected.
Ghislaine Maxwell was in federal custody at the MDC at this time.
